channel.title: Updates on Sara Soueidan
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Sara Soueidan

item.title: 2015 In Review
item.description: Happy new year! 🌟 OK, I felt awkward starting a blog post that way—I confess. ☺️ But this is also an unusual post—not an article about CSS or SVG, and not a lengthy tutorial about web development. It is also the quickest post I ever wrote. This is my first time writing a year in review kind of post. A lot of great stuff has happened in 2015 that I thought are worth documenting and have a look back at a few years from now.
